title: Understanding CCPA
text: The California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) is a state statute intended to enhance privacy rights and consumer protection for residents of California, USA.

title: Key Features of CCPA
text: CCPA provides consumers with the right to know what personal data is being collected, the right to delete personal data, and the right to opt-out of the sale of personal data.
